remarks: The first symbol of a concatenation of two words is the first symbol of the first word if the first word is not empty.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 22-Sep-2018.)
statement: ccatfv0 $p |- ( ( A e. Word V /\ B e. Word V /\ 0 < ( # ` A ) ) -> ( ( A concat B ) ` 0 ) = ( A ` 0 ) ) $.
